response.overview: African Ride takes you on a breathtaking adventure, where Tomáš Vejmola, a brave tuktuk collector, sets out on an almost impossible mission - to cross the African continent in a small, three-wheeled tuktuk.  Without any modifications, with only the determination and support of his friend David Žváček, they embark on an incredible 111-day journey through the roughest and most demanding terrains, with the goal of driving from South Africa all the way home to Hranice na Moravě. On their way, they meet fascinating indigenous tribes and learn about their unique culture. They drive through national parks and come into close contact with wild African wildlife. With a good dose of humor, they reveal the true face of this stunning continent - without frills, authentic and unbridled. The African Ride is a story of courage, perseverance and untamed human curiosity that will draw you into a world of unexpected challenges, fascinating encounters and unique wildlife experiences.
response.title: African cavalry
